nodes.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests

nodes.excerpt: Itâ€™s a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
nodes.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.

nodes.excerpt: Simply Snack is the easiest way to keep track of your food and diet. Log your food easily by just taking a picture of it. Thereâ€™s no need for long descriptions or dull questions â€“ and no need to stress about what you should or shouldnâ€™t eat.

nodes.excerpt: A different way to organize your To-Do List or view iOS Reminders. A better tasks widget for your homescreen. Prioritize your to-do list with the weekly monthly yearly tasks planner app. Now with optional Reminders Sync, homescreen widgets, and iCloud backup.

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
nodes.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS

nodes.excerpt: Get safer and more effective workouts at home with 1:1 voice feedback to improve your posture and encouragement to push you further. Counts reps as you do them â±ï¸ Instant suggestions on improving posture ğŸ—¨ï¸ Cheers you throughout your training session ğŸ—£ï¸
nodes.title: Physique AI (Android & iOS) - AI-powered 1:1 posture correction to improve home workouts
nodes.author: Vignesh Prabhu

nodes.excerpt: 1 Second Everyday is a video diary that makes it easy to take your day-to-day moments and create a meaningful movie of your life. Itâ€™s a home for all your notable memories, not just the Insta-worthy. Get started with 1SE today!
nodes.title: 1 Second Everyday 4.0 - A movie that includes every day of the rest of your life
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: PictureThisÂ® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a â€œgreen thumbâ€! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!

nodes.title: Hal - An assistant who gets you

nodes.excerpt: Buddio is a mental health app to help support with depression, stress, and anxiety. Developed by software developers and psychologists based on the principles of science-backed therapies.
nodes.title: Buddio - Mental health for everyone
nodes.author: Abid Masood

nodes.excerpt: Tappity is building the worldâ€™s largest library of interactive lessons for kidsâ€”starting with science. Find 100+ popular science topics taught by live-action characters who appear to magically interact with your kids in real time.
nodes.title: Tappity - World's largest library of interactive lessons for kids
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Look Back On Your Year Our guided annual review helps bring perspective and closure to the past year before you dive into the year ahead.
nodes.title: Guided Annual Review by Reflection.app - A guided review to help you make sense of and grow from 2020

nodes.excerpt: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
nodes.title: Brainie - Music patterns to improve deep work, relaxation, and sleep.
nodes.author: Petr Selinger

nodes.excerpt: Jumpr is the worldâ€™s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
nodes.title: Jumpr - Virtual jump rope APP
nodes.author: David Liu

nodes.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
nodes.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health
nodes.author: Kartik Bala

nodes.excerpt: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
nodes.title: InCharge X - The 100W Swiss Army knife of cables
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Update your phones look with over 4,500 aesthetic icons made by pro designers and trending Dribbble artists. Our iOS app makes it easy to browse aesthetic themes and download any icon you want â€“from minimal monochromes to Futurama characters. Plus, itâ€™s free!
nodes.title: Aesthetic Icons App by Icons8 - Personalize your iPhone with clean and modern icon themes
nodes.author: Ivan

nodes.excerpt: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
nodes.title: Yak Tack: Mobile App - Broaden your vocabulary. Simply.
nodes.author: Jeremy Thomas

nodes.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourselfâ€”it's a whole new way to chat.
nodes.title: Honk - Real-time messaging
nodes.author: Alberto Antoniazzi

nodes.excerpt: Discover 16 free objects created with Cinema 4D. Virtual reality tools and other gadgets are embodied in volumetric graphics. Customize any object in Cinema 4D to get your perfect one. All elements are fully editable.
nodes.title: Free 3D Slam Illustrations - Virtual reality gadgets are embodied in volumetric graphics
nodes.author: Anastasiya Yavorskaya

nodes.excerpt: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
nodes.title: Woofbuzz - Provides tools to ensure your dogâ€™s daily needs are met
nodes.author: Alexander Adam

nodes.excerpt: Fastival is an intermittent fasting app which supports you to take breaks from eating to feel healthier and lose weight. Intermittent fasting boosts your immune system by giving your body time to digest food better and in turn strengthen the bodyâ€™s defenses.
nodes.title: Fastival - Discover the power of intermittent fasting
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz â›„ï¸

nodes.excerpt: Take your metrics on the go with our iPhone app! The ChartMogul Subscription Data Platform makes it easy to import your billing data and then analyze it like a pro with industry-leading subscription analytics.
nodes.title: The ChartMogul iPhone App - Check your SaaS metrics on the go
nodes.author: Ilia Markov

nodes.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
nodes.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!
nodes.author: Ann Elnekave

nodes.excerpt: Instantly create photo-real avatars of friends, family, celebrities, paintings, by using any photo with a face! In one click, make them sing, say anything you want, puppet their face like you an Animoji. Check out our new holiday backgrounds too!
nodes.title: Tokkingheads by Rosebud - Instantly animate a portrait photo w/ text, speech, or video
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
nodes.title: Gumdrop - Find your happy match.
nodes.author: Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just worksâ€”for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
nodes.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
nodes.author: Allen Ussher

nodes.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
nodes.title: Flex Widgets - A widget editor for iPhone and iPad
nodes.author: Yannik Schrade

nodes.excerpt: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
nodes.title: Monet - Draw your way to love, to friends, and to a good time.
nodes.author: Jonathan Xue

nodes.excerpt: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Letâ€™s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
nodes.title: Roadtrip - Good tunes, good friends, good vibes.
nodes.author: Harry Stebbings

nodes.excerpt: Makeena rewards consumers for buying â€œbetter,â€ while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
nodes.title: Makeena - Making better products affordable no matter where you shop.
nodes.author: Karen Frame

nodes.excerpt: EduDo is a mobile learning platform with short user-generated interactive videos to watch on the go
nodes.title: EduDo - Social learning platform
nodes.author: Ilya Hets

nodes.excerpt: ProStyles is an AI camera app that edits your photos & videos in the style of pro photographers as you shoot them. The built-in Style Store features AI style models created by some of the best photographers out there.
nodes.title: ProStyle Camera by NeuralCam - AI Cam App - Photos auto-edited in the style of pros
